description: Strict+hardened mode-pair failure classification matrix for hard-parts cross-boundary E2E catalog scenarios.

classes.trigger: all bound scenarios have mode_pair_result=match and strict/hardened outcomes are pass
classes.action: No escalation needed; preserve replay key for regression baselines.

classes.trigger: mode pair is available and not mismatched, but one or more bound scenarios return non-pass in both modes
classes.action: Reproduce with replay key, inspect artifact refs, and file targeted repair bead.

classes.trigger: one or more bound scenarios report mode_pair_result=mismatch
classes.action: Treat as strict/hardened semantic drift; escalate immediately with trace+pair report links.

classes.trigger: missing strict/hardened pair data or mode_pair_result=incomplete for bound scenarios
classes.action: Re-run with deterministic seed; check suite interruption, manifest coverage, and mode filter.

classes.trigger: one or more bound scenarios appear in flake_quarantine_report quarantined_cases
classes.action: Follow quarantine remediation workflow and require two deterministic clean reruns.
